title: Bloed, zweet & luxeproblemen
overview: From 3 December, the new series "Blood, sweat & luxury problems" can be seen on EÃ©n. Karine Claassen takes six young people, all children of famous Flemish people, to Sri Lanka and Ghana, where they experience how our luxury products are made. How do they react if the world turns out to be less just than they had thought?
